title: Where can I find the best automotive news? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where can you find best automotive news? Let’s clear up one thing here. There’s no such thing as free “Quality knowledge”. If you want to learn about the elite stuffs, things which are groundbreaking in automotive industry, you will have to pay. Become a member of SAE- Society of Automotive Engineers. The elite club of Automobile industry. You can find tons of latest technology, journals, research papers and trending news of automobiles from across the world. And they aren’t written by amateur writers, rather professionals and R&D guys publish them, so you know all of them are 100% informative practically. A link- SAE International. Read and Learn.

One of the best websites, which provides its visitors with the latest automotive news and trends is AutomobilesReview. The website is a great source of valuable information related to auto news, car tuning, concept cars, and HD car pictures. You can also download AutomobilesReview app, which is available for Android and iOS users. Another suggestions for auto news websites are: Motor Trend, AutoCar and Auto Express.
